Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier obstruction on the tracks near Oakton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier obstruction on the tracks near Oakton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kolmer
ShortDescription: 70 Division  buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Kostner, Augusta, Cicero and Division: due to, flooding near Division/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division  buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Kostner, Augusta, Cicero and Division: due to, flooding near Division/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.
